Bosses.Name: Titan
Bosses.Strategy:
Titan will periodically cause raidwide damage throughout the fight. 

At 75% HP Titan will jump and spawn a red ring on the outside of the arena players must stand just outside the ring to avoid taking heavy damage and falling off the platform. After this Titan will start casting Landslide. 

At 50% HP Titan will do his jump move once more, After he comes back down he will go invulnerable and the players will need to attack his heart. 

After this titan will start to cast Weight of the land and Granite Goal until he dies.

Mechanics.Name: Landslide
Mechanics.Description: A line AOE that will knock anyone caught in it backwards off the arena.

Mechanics.Name: Granite Goal
Mechanics.Description: Targets one random player and traps them, the other players must attack the goal to free the trapped player.
